name: Village of the Year
description:
Ever looked at expensive train sets and model villages and thought, "that looks like fun", but wish to avoid the cost, space issues, and problems with everyone thinking you're a reclusive geek? This game has you covered.

  • Design and build: Craft the perfect model village from 100+ buildings, paths and roads, animals, vegetation, trains (!), and more.
  • Spray and photograph: Add rich textures to your village scene for greater customisation and use the in-game camera to take the perfect picture of your finished work
  • Browse and chill: There's a tablet for surfing the web and a big screen to cast to. Put some lofi beats or ambient on (or whatever you fancy) whilst you work.

Village of the Year is in active development that we've decided to release on early access to get insights from players as to how this game should progress. As you can imagine, there are a million different directions we could expand in, and we figure this is a good time to ask the players.
